appName.description:
Automatically calculates the average grade in QIS for HS Trier:
It multiplies each grade with the respective ects points, adds everything up and divides the result by the sum of all ects points.

The result will be displayed directly in grade table.

appDesc.message: Automatically calculates the average grade in QIS for HS Trier.
